price: ߥߏߙߏ߲ߥߏߙߏ߲ߞߊ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߸ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߟߏ-ߞߘߐ-ߞߏ߫ ߛߌ߫ ߡߍ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
